thread.title: Shots fired at South Shore Plaza in Braintree
thread.title_full: Shots fired at South Shore Plaza in Braintree

author: The Boston Globe
title: Shots fired at South Shore Plaza in Braintree
text:
Shots were fired at the South Shore Plaza in Braintree early Friday night, according to local and State Police.
Two people were involved in an altercation and “shots were fired by one or both of them,” David Procopio, a state police spokesman said in a statement.
Speaking to reporters at the scene shortly before 8 p.m., Braintree Police Chief Paul J. Shastany said that no one had been hit by gunfire, and that a handgun had been recovered at the scene.
Read the complete story at BostonGlobe.com .
